Pinboard ➡ Standard Notes Importer

Move your Pinboard bookmarks into Standard Notes.

Your browser doesn't support some of the features required to use this importer. Please upgrade your browser.

  1. Visit your Pinboard backup screen and export your bookmarks as JSON.

  2. Upload the exported bookmarks file below.

    Loading...

  3. Once that's done, download a file to be imported into Standard Notes.

  4. Press "Account" on the bottom-right of the Standard Notes desktop app and select the "Import Data from Archive".
